Name: LU 773 - Zoning, EAST HARLEM NEIGHBORHOOD REZONING, Manhattan (C 170358 ZMM)
Title: Resolution approving with modifications the decision of the City Planning Commission on ULURP No. C 170358 ZMM, a Zoning Map amendment (L.U. No. 773).

History.Action: Approved by Committee with Modifications and Referred to CPC
History.Description: This Resolution was Approved by Committee with Modifications and Referred to CPC
A motion was made that this Resolution be Approved, by Council approved by consent Roll Call.

\v0\par
  By Council Members Greenfield and Richards 0\par
\par
	ab WHEREAS, the City Planning Commission filed with the Council on October 2, 2017 its decision dated October 2, 2017 (the "Decision"), on the application submitted by the New York City Department of City Planning, pursuant to Sections 197-c and 201 of the New York City Charter, for an amendment of the Zoning Map, Section Nos. 6a and 6b, which in conjunction with the related actions would facilitate the East Harlem Neighborhood Initiative, a comprehensive, community-focused effort aimed at identifying opportunities for the creation of new mixed-income housing and the preservation of existing affordable housing units (ULURP No. C 170358 ZMM), Community District 11,\cf1  \cf0\expndtw-4 Borough of Manhattan \expndtw0 (the "Application");\par
\pard\ltrpar
owidctlpar\qj	x720	x1440	x2160	qr	x9360\par
\pard\ltrpar
owidctlpar\li-90\qj	x720	x1440	x2279	ab WHEREAS, the Application is related to applications N 170359 ZRM (L.U. No. 774) an amendment to the text of the Zoning Resolution to establish an East Harlem Corridor Special District and to designate a Mandatory Inclusionary Housing area; and C 170360 HUM (L.U. No. 775), amendment to the bulk and use regulations, and the expiration date, of the Milbank Frawley Circle-East Urban Renewal Plan;\par
\pard\ltrpar
owidctlpar i806\li-86\qj\par
WHEREAS, the Decision is subject to review and action by the Council pursuant to Section 197-d(b)(1) of the City Charter;\par
\pard\ltrpar
owidctlpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar
owidctlpar i720\qj WHEREAS, upon due notice, the Council held a public hearing on the Decision and Application on October 11, 2017;\par
\par
WHEREAS, the Council has considered the land use and other policy issues relating to the Decision and Application; and\par
\pard\ltrpar
owidctlpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar
owidctlpar i720\qj WHEREAS, the Council has considered the relevant environmental issues, including the Final Environmental Impact Statement (FEIS) for which a Notice of Completion was issued on September 19, 2017 (CEQR No. 17DCP048M), which identified significant adverse impacts with respect to hazardous materials, air quality and noise which would be avoided  through the placement of (E) designations (E-422), and additional significant adverse impacts with respect to shadows, historic and cultural resources (architectural and archeological), transportation (traffic, transit and pedestrians), and construction activities related to noise, and the Technical Memoranda dated September 29, 2017, (the \ldblquote Technical Memorandadblquote );\par
\pard\ltrpar
owidctlpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar
owidctlpar\qj	x0	x864	x2016	x3168	x4320	x5472	x6624	x7776	x8928\par
RESOLVED:\par
\par
\pard\ltrpar
owidctlpar\qj	x0	x720	x864	x2016	x3168	x4320	x5472	x6624	x7776	x8928	ab Having considered the FEIS and the Technical Memoranda with respect to the Decision and Application, the Council finds that:\par
\pard\ltrpar
owidctlpar\qj  	ab\par
\pard\ltrpar
owidctlpar i720\qj (1)	ab The FEIS meets the requirements of 6 N.Y.C.R.R. Part 617; \par
\pard\ltrpar
owidctlpar\qj	x0	x720	x1080\par
\pard\ltrpar
owidctlpar i-1440\li1440\qj	x720	ab (2)	ab Consistent with social, economic and other essential considerations, from among the reasonable alternatives thereto, the Proposed Actions, as modified with the modifications adopted herein and in the Technical Memorandum 002,  is one which minimizes or avoids adverse environmental impacts to the maximum extent practicable; and\par
\pard\ltrpar
owidctlpar i-720\li1440\qj	x0	x720	x1080\par
(3)	ab	ab The adverse environmental impacts identified in the FEIS will be minimized or avoided to the maximum extent practicable by the placement of (E) designations for Hazardous Materials, Air Quality, and Noise, which form part of the Proposed Actions, or the specification of required mitigation measures, as appropriate; and \par
\par
(4)	ab	ab The Decision, together with the FEIS and the Technical Memoranda, constitute the written statement of facts, and of social, economic and other factors and standards that form the basis of this determination, pursuant to 6 N.Y.C.R.R. 'a7617.11(d).\par
\pard\ltrpar
owidctlpar\qj	x0	x720	x1080\par
\pard\ltrpar
owidctlpar i720\qj	x0	x720	x1080 The Decision and the FEIS constitute the written statement of facts, and of social, economic and other factors and standards that form the basis of this determination, pursuant to 6 N.Y.C.R.R. 'a7617.11(d).\par
\pard\ltrpar
owidctlpar\qj	x0	x720	x1260	x1440	x1620\par
\pard\ltrpar
owidctlpar\qj	ab Pursuant to Section 197-d and 200 of the City Charter and on the basis of the Decision and Application, and based on the environmental determination and consideration described in the report, C 170358 ZMM, incorporated by reference herein, the Council approves the Decision with the  following modifications:\par
\par
Matter \strike strike out\strike0  is old, deleted by the City Council;\par
Matter \ul underline\ulnone  is new, added by the City Council.\par
